tests.name: Exercise 1
tests.setup: git submodule update --init --recursive && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && cmake --build .
tests.run: cd build && ctest -VVV -R "create author using non\-default constructor"

tests.setup: git submodule update --init --recursive && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && cmake --build .
